Question: Which characters are related to Aakash 'Akku' Kapoor in *Hungama 2*?
Options:
A. Vaani Kapoor
B. Colonel Govind Kapoor
C. Radhe Shyam Tiwari
D. All of the above
Answer: A) Vaani Kapoor, B) Colonel Govind Kapoor

Question: Which characters are related to Aakash 'Akku' Kapoor in *Hungama 2*?
Options:
A. Siddhant Ghegadmal as Jayesh
B. Paresh Rawal as Radhe Shyam Tiwari
C. Ashutosh Rana as Colonel Govind Kapoor
D. Meezaan Jafri as Aakash 'Akku' Kapoor
Answer: A) Siddhant Ghegadmal as Jayesh, C) Ashutosh Rana as Colonel Govind Kapoor, D) Meezaan Jafri as Aakash 'Akku' Kapoor

Answer: A) Atharv Johnny as Parul, B) Meezaan Jafri as Aakash 'Akku' Kapoor, C) Ashutosh Rana as Colonel Govind Kapoor

Question: Which characters are related to each other in the movie *Hungama 2*?
Options:
A. Hardika Sharma as Vidhi is related to Meezaan Jafri as Aakash 'Akku' Kapoor
B. Meezaan Jafri as Aakash 'Akku' Kapoor is the son of Ashutosh Rana as Colonel Govind Kapoor
C. Paresh Rawal as Radhe Shyam Tiwari is the father of Hardika Sharma as Vidhi

Answer: A) Hardika Sharma as Vidhi is related to Meezaan Jafri as Aakash 'Akku' Kapoor, D) Ashutosh Rana as Colonel Govind Kapoor is the father of Meezaan Jafri as Aakash 'Akku' Kapoor
